mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report(reportNum, subject, content, regDate, hitCount, thumbnail, userCode) VALUES (#{reportNum}, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, #{thumbnail}, #{userCode})
INSERT INTO reportFIle(fileNum, imageFilename, reportNum) VALUES(REPORTFILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{imageFilename}, #{reportNum})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM report r JOIN member m ON r.userCode = m.userCode

SELECT r.reportNum, subject, hitCount, m.userName, thumbnail, TO_CHAR(r.regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, NVL(fileCount, 0) fileCount FROM report r JOIN member m ON r.userCode = m.userCode LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT reportNum, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM reportFile GROUP BY reportNum ) f ON r.reportNum = f.reportNum
ORDER BY reportNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT reportNum, r.userCode, m.userName, subject, content, r.regDate, hitCount, thumbnail FROM report r JOIN member m ON r.userCode = m.userCode WHERE reportNum = #{reportNum}

SELECT reportNum, subject FROM report r JOIN member m ON r.userCode = m.userCode
AND (reportNum > #{reportNum})
ORDER BY reportNum ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT reportNum, subject FROM report r JOIN member m ON r.userCode = m.userCode
AND (reportNum < #{reportNum})
ORDER BY reportNum DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE reportFile SET imageFileName = #{imageFileName} WHERE reportNum = #{reportNum}
